| HistoryText             = Clan Tatsu were a Yakuza syndicate whose "Mon" (crest) was a dragon's claws firmly grasping a world. It was a syndicate that had an elite force of cyborgs, the [[Cyburai (Earth-616)|Cyburai]]. They were at war with Clan Yashida due to what happened at a sumo arena, when [[Robert Drake (Earth-616)|Iceman]] and [[Mariko Yashida (Earth-616)|Lady Yashida]]'s ninjas attempted to rescue [[Tatsu'o (Earth-616)|Lord Tatsu'o]]'s granddaughter and Bobby Drake's girlfriend, [[Opal Tanaka (Earth-616)|Opal Tanaka]].{{r|X-Factor Vol 1 63|64}}
